Title: Flesh and Bone
Plot: A Cylon, who calls himself Leoben, is discovered on one of the ships in the fleet. Commander Adama sends Kara to interrogate him ? or, rather, it. The Cylon tells Kara that he planted a nuclear device on one of the ships. Although she doesn't believe it, Kara passes on the warning.
GuestStars: Christina Schild, Eric Breker, Biski Gugushe, Callum Keith Rennie, Matthew Bennett
